content: उत्था {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> [उद्-स्था] {@--1@} To get up, stand, rise, raise oneself; उत्तिष्ठेत्प्रथमं चास्य <ls>Ms. 2. 194</ls>; <ls>R. 9. 59</ls>; <ls>Śi. 9. 39.</ls> {@--2@} To get up from, leave, give up or cease from; अनशनादुत्तिष्ठति <ls>Pt. 4.</ls> {@--3@} To rise, come up (as the sun &c.). {@--4@} To rebound (as a ball); कराभिघातोत्थितकन्दुकेयं <ls>R. 16. 83.</ls> {@--5@} To come forth, arise, spring or originate from, accrue from; ग्रा माच्छतमुत्तिष्ठति Mbh; यदुत्तिष्ठति वर्णेभ्यो नृपाण क्षयितत्फलं <ls>Ś. 2. 13</ls>; अन्यदमृतादुत्थितम् <ls>K. 136</ls>; उदतिष्ठन् प्रशंसावाचः <ls>Dk. 49</ls> shouts of applause burst forth (were heard); <ls>N. 22. 44.</ls> {@--6@} To rise, increase in strength or power, grow, (as an enemy, disease &c.); (<ab>Atm.</ab>) उत्तिष्ठमानस्तु परो नोपेक्ष्यः पथ्यमिच्छता <ls>Śi. 2. 10</ls> (= <ls>Pt. 1. 234.</ls>) {@--7@} To become animated, rise (from the dead); मृतेत्थिता <ls>Ku. 7. 4.</ls> {@--8@} To be active or brave, rise up; हृदयदौर्बल्यं त्यक्त्वोत्तिष्ठ <ls>Bg. 2. 3</ls>, <ls n="Bg. 2.">37</ls>; <ls>Mv. 2</ls>; <ls>Pt. 3. 21.</ls> {@--9@} To make efforts; take pains, strive, try; उत्तिष्ठमानं मित्रार्थे कस्त्वां न बहु मन्यते <ls>Bk. 8. 12</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">20. 18</ls>; <ls>Mv. 4. 6</ls>; मुकावुत्तिष्ठते जनः <ls>Ki. 11. 13</ls>; उदस्थित क्रतौ <ls>Śi. 14. 17.</ls> {@--10@} To excel, surpass. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (उत्थापयति) {@--1@} To cause to stand up, raise, lift up: उत्थाप्यते ग्रावा <ls>H. 3. 42</ls>; <ls>R. 14. 59</ls>; raise or throw up (as dust); <ls>R. 7. 39.</ls> {@--2@} To instigate, excite, rouse to action; त्वामुत्थापयति द्वयं <ls>Śi. 2. 57</ls>, <ls n="Śi. 2.">102</ls>; <ls>Kām. 5. 40</ls>; <ls>H. 3. 92</ls>; <ls>Dk. 107.</ls> {@--3@} To arouse, awaken, raise to life, make alive; प्राणो हीदं सर्वमुत्थापयति <ls>Śat. Br.</ls> {@--4@} To support, feed, aid; अत्र परिकरोत्थापितोऽ र्थांतरन्यासालंकारः <ls>Malli.</ls> on <ls>Ki. 8. 4.</ls>
